fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Support a player, increasing their voting power by 1 for both nominations and lynch the next day.
-After participating in a secured node, target a player. Their “after participating in a secured node” ability, if they have one, will be available the next night, even if they were not part of a secured node.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Your abilities are Astral.
-If the target of your second ability does not have an “after participating in a secured node” ability, they will be informed that you attempted this on them and failed.
